title: The Dream Voyagers
description: A Christy Award-winning Author A lovely young woman thrust beyond the reaches of her own world. A brave young man searching for something he cannot explain. Together they travel the pirated routes of a frozen and menacing land, separated by space and time, united in the call of their hearts. Danger lurks in the shadowlanes, seeking to destroy. Yet out of the darkness come yearning, hope, and triumph.
author: Thomas  Locke
